titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses and to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to such deduction.

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses and to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to such deduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to make permanent the income tax deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses.
